overview.title: Advanced Character Illustration Vectoriser
overview.description: A sophisticated system for converting detailed character illustrations (PNG images) into professional CAD-compatible vector formats (DWG) with intelligent masking, edge detection, and professional styling suitable for technical drawing applications.
overview.primary_goal: Transform hand-drawn character illustrations into clean, scalable vector drawings while preserving anatomical details, edge quality, and artistic intent.

characteristics.transparency: Support alpha channel and checkerboard transparency patterns

features.layers: Multiple professional layers with appropriate line weights

masking_system.purpose: Intelligently separate character from background, handling transparency artifacts

features.texture_analysis: Local variance, Gabor filters, directional coherence
features.adaptive_weighting: Dynamic fusion based on local image characteristics

masking_quality.edge_alignment: Mask boundaries should align with character edges (target: >70%)
masking_quality.coverage: Appropriate foreground coverage without background noise (15-85%)
masking_quality.compactness: Smooth, coherent mask boundaries without fragmentation

vectorization_quality.smoothness: Contours should be smooth without jagged edges
vectorization_quality.accuracy: Vector paths should closely follow original artwork
vectorization_quality.simplification: Optimal point reduction while preserving shape integrity

output_standards.compatibility: DWG files compatible with AutoCAD 2000+ and similar CAD software
output_standards.professional_appearance: Clean, publication-ready line work suitable for technical documentation
output_standards.scalability: Vector output scales cleanly from thumbnail to poster size
